hooks.command: cd tools && uv run ce context health --json | jq -r 'if .drift_score > 30 then "⚠️ HIGH DRIFT: " + (.drift_score | tostring) + "% - Run: ce context sync" elif .drift_score > 10 then "⚠️ Moderate drift: " + (.drift_score | tostring) + "%" else "✅ Context healthy: " + (.drift_score | tostring) + "%" end'
